general_advisory: No rainfall and dry weather expected during the next five days. Complete nursery sowing for winter vegetable crops. Go for sowing of pea, gram, and green gram as paira crop fifteen days prior to harvest of paddy in low land.

advisory: Keep water in the field up to grain filling stage.

Control gundhi bug incidence by spraying Ethofenoprox.
Harvest rice when 80-85% grains in the panicles are matured.
